column5: Should be back to Rivalry type hockey tonight with the "stride" the two teams have gotten into lately. Go Sabres! Boo me all you want but without the Buffalo Fan......these matchups just wouldnt be as much fun!
hopefully it is a good old time hard hitting leafs sabres game.  go leafs
Ray and Domi should be able to dress for these match ups lol
Sabres!  They might be tired after that win vs. Ottawa last night though.  Should be a good game.
I hear John Ferguson is doing some commentary for TSN.  JF
